title: Page Management

default-product-list-page.title: Search results page
default-product-list-page.hint: The search result page is the display screen after searching for the product and the search result page is a fixed page

template-page.title: Product content page
template-page.hint: The product content page is a single product detail page and new products will use the current default layout

path.title: Page URL Name
path.placeholder: Please enter the page URL name

tabTitle.title: Page Tab Name
tabTitle.placeholder: Please enter the page page name

keywords.title: SEO keywords
keywords.placeholder: Please separate keywords with halfwidth coma (clothes, accessories)
keywords.hint: Google does not support these keywords. Excessive amount of keywords will result in some search engines being considered as spam websites.

description.title: SEO description
description.placeholder: Please enter no more than 75 words
description.hint: Tell customers more about the services provided on your website to attract them to visit your website

image.title: SEO Photo
image.hint: Search engine SEO Screen Capture Settings

notice: Except for the footer menu, the rest of the menu content will be included in the phone menu on the mobile device.
template-can-not-delete: Product content page layout cannot be deleted after adding

assign-default-product-template-page.success: Set to the current default version successfully
assign-default-product-template-page.error: Failed to set current default layout

confirm.title: Do you confirm to delete?
confirm.content: Deleted page cannot be restored. Do you confirm to delete?
